pr_title: [lgwebos] Add dynamic options providers for application and channel

timeline.message:
[lgwebos] Add dynamic options providers for application and channel

Fixes #7123

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

Include the channel number in the option label

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Mistake ! The default must be in the sitemap file, not in the item file.
